  27. (* [force_logged log f t] is equivalent to [force f t] but if [f]
  28.    returns [Error _] then [t] is recorded in [log]. [backtrack log]
  29.    will then reset all the recorded [t]s back to their original
  30.    state. *)
  31. ‌val log : unit -> log
  32. ‌val force_logged :
  33.   log -> ('a -> ('b, 'c) result) -> ('a,('b, 'c) result) t -> ('b, 'c) result
  34. ‌val backtrack : log -> unit
